messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1124
messages.msgSnippet: ... My really liberal sister had a Republican fiance for a while. How does that work? Seriously, how do you talk about things without getting upset with each
messages.messageBody:
> Well, I'm not, but my husband is (a Republican
> unschooler). I'm a liberal
> left-of-the-Democrats unschooler

My really liberal sister had a Republican fiance for a
while. How does that work? Seriously, how do you talk
about things without getting upset with each other? I
can't imagine the closest person in my life, the one I
sleep next to every night, having such different ideas
about life and the world. Juli

=====
You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him to find it within himself --Galileo

__________________________________________________

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1124
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I m not, but my husband is (a Republican unschooler). I m a liberal left-of-the-Democrats unschooler. Surprisingly (not to introduce politics, but I
messages.messageBody:
>Wouldn't it be great
> if someone wrote back and said, "Hey, I'm a Republican
> unschooler!" :)


Well, I'm not, but my husband is (a Republican unschooler). I'm a liberal
left-of-the-Democrats unschooler. Surprisingly (not to introduce politics,
but I will :-), one of the things I disagree with most about the Democratic
party is their attitude towards school and homeschooling and one of the
political things that my Republican hubby and I see eye to eye on is the
need for market competition in the arena of schools instead of throwing more
money at a failing system.

It takes all kinds :-)

Blue Skies!
-Robin-
Mom to Mackenzie (8/28/96) "Asa is running her voice out"
and Asa (10/5/99) Who sings "the alien song"
http://www.geocities.com/the_clevengers Flying Clevenger Family
